body_html: I have found the issue, the rewriter currently only recognizes one ordering of inputs to MatMul. I will work on a fix for that. But in the meantime you can change all of you Matmuls to tf.matmul(y1, w2) (having the weight as the second parameter to get thing working in the meantime. Thanks!

body: I have found the issue, the rewriter currently only recognizes one ordering of inputs to MatMul. I will work on a fix for that. But in the meantime you can change all of you Matmuls to `tf.matmul(y1, w2)` (having the weight as the second parameter to get thing working in the meantime. Thanks!
